item.description:
After nearly nine months of being a POB, the Doc has escaped his shackles and is loose on the town this weekend.

It was the fan letters that kept him sane while in solitary confinement, and for those fans he is toasting this weekend's event.

The Doc will first appear at Nick a Nees - winner of best dive bar five years in a row. After which he'll go look at open listings at "The Apartment" (373 Richmond st.) and finish off with some ribs at "Ricks Roadhouse" (370 Richmond st). Great set list for a cold evening as each place is only a few steps from one another. The plan is 2 hours at each stop, but if you're late and the group isn't at at one, they'll be at the next/previous.

If you're new to the Doc's events, this isn't your monday happy hour ... this is late nite shenanigans.

There is adequate parking in the area, but if you plan to participate in the shenanigans, plan for bumming a ride or taxi home.

-it's time for some friday night medicine...
item.how_to_find_us: Doc wears his sunglasses at night
item.name: A spoon full of LateNite helps the Medicine go down
